Who is at risk for Age-related Macular Degeneration? ?,"AMD is most common in older people, but it can occur during middle age. The risk increases with age. Other risk factors include smoking, obesity, white race, family history of AMD, and female gender.",NIHSeniorHealth,Age-related Macular Degeneration
